definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: So far they have 17 women from all over the world who have been nominated.
sentences.chinese: 至今在全球範圍內已經有17位女性被提名。

sentences.english: Nominated for Oscar Best Foreign Language Film in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 本片榮獲1998年奧斯卡最佳外語片提名。

sentences.english: The Nominees must have at least 1year continuous full-time service with the organization.
sentences.chinese: 被提名者必須具備持續至少一年在該部門服務的經歷。

sentences.english: Nominations for the Nobel Peace Prize are not open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 爲諾貝爾和平獎的提名是不向公衆開放的。
《泰坦尼克號》獲得14項提名和11個小金人。

sentences.english: This is her first Oscar nomination.
sentences.chinese: 這是她的首次奧斯卡提名。

sentences.english: There are five nominees in most Oscar categories.
sentences.chinese: 奧斯卡的大多數獎項都有五位被提名者。

sentences.english: She was nominated for an appeals court judgeship in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 她在一九九九年被提名上訴法院法官的職位。

sentences.english: In May, I made the decision to nominate Judge Breyer.
It was the first nomination for Cotillard.
sentences.chinese: 這是歌迪亞第一次被提名。

sentences.english: Please write the age of your nominee.
sentences.chinese: 請在下面填上被提名者的年齡。

sentences.english: Country singer Taylor Swift is among the nominees for Best New Artist.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村歌手泰勒斯維夫提名爲最佳年度新人。

sentences.english: We had won the nomination by organizing around the primary schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我們圍繞初選進度組織管理，所以贏得了提名。

sentences.english: Bigelow was only the fourth female ever to be nominated for Best Director.
sentences.chinese: 畢格羅是有史以來第四位獲得最佳導演提名的女性。

sentences.english: Hacksaw Ridge and Lion also received six nods.
sentences.chinese: 《血戰鋼鋸嶺》和《雄獅》也獲得六項提名。

sentences.english: Motorhead. Mastodon has been nominated a ton, but has never won.
sentences.chinese: 乳齒象樂隊無數次獲得提名，但是從來沒有獲獎過。

definition: to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
